messages.subject: Snow madness.
messages.msgSnippet: Wow.  We went hiking, which turned into snow shoeing, and snow ball fights and I think one frostbitten toe, but wow! We haven t had much snow for the past few
messages.messageBody:
Wow. We went hiking, which turned into snow shoeing, and snow ball
fights and I think one frostbitten toe, but wow!

We haven't had much snow for the past few years and so haven't been snow
shoeing. But we all seemed to be suffering from cabin fever over the
weekend and decided to head out. We did find snow deep enough to
warrant the snow shoes.
Dylan had a wonderful time, had more stamina than we did and wants to go
again next weekend. Lots of time on the Playstation I think, has made
him a dead aim with snow balls as well. We left a snow man standing out
there and felt bad when we got home that he was all alone. If he's
still there next weekend we'll make him a friend. My husband says a
snow dog lifting his leg on Mr. Snowman would be funny, but Dylan doesn't
seem too impressed.
Saw lots of deer and elk and one coyote.
If my toe doesn't fall off everything will be perfect.

Deb L, sore but happy.
